file_content.text: Good work taking out those mercs. If there's one thing I can't stand, it's thugs pretending they're soldiers.
You're leaving a big impression on the mercenary forces. We're intercepting panic transmissions. Makes my day.
Nice op. There's nothing wrong with these mercs a few kilos of detonite can't fix.
Blast those mercs... not even the Empire treats slaves that badly. We'll evac the survivors to Keylander Station for emergency medical treatment.
My scouts report merc forces abandoning their posts at the other slave camps. They're running scared--and the civilians are running to evac shuttles.
The Science Office big brains are receiving sensor readings from the planet's core. Let's hope they can explain why Makeb isn't an asteroid field.
I think you just insured you'll be getting fan mail for the rest of your life. We'll get the civilians to an evac zone.
Glad you could free those civilians before the mercs got to them. Those people have been through enough.
That was one tough merc leader--but he picked the wrong fight. I hope the other scum are paying attention.
Nice work. Just ID'd that merc leader. He was on the SIS "most wanted" list. I'll make sure you get the credit.
Good work gathering that intel. The more we know about Imperial forces on Makeb, the harder we can hit them.
Getting solid intel on Imperial movements, thanks to you. My Stratcom team is already analyzing it.
At least we know the mesa isn't collapsing anytime soon. Your work on that detection grid paid off.
Get in there and be quick. There's no telling when that mesa will collapse!
The data you found in that merc base revealed a location where civilian survivors are trapped. Get to those people before the mercs do.
Good work uploading that data on Aboro Mesa. It revealed coordinates to supply depots. We can use what's there to aid our rescue efforts.
Scouts report the mercs diverted forces to those drilling platforms you disrupted. That should make this op easier.
Nice work liberating all those mercenary speeders. We're transporting them to the mesa now.
Those manifests you secured show trapped civilians nearby. The mercs are leaving them cooped-up there like banthas. Let's get them free.
You've got the mercs chasing their own tails. They moved a bunch of defense turrets from this zone to that abandoned drill site you already secured. Too bad for them.
Use the flare gun you picked up and signal for reinforcements. They'll come running.
Outstanding mission success. We've put the mercs on notice--now it's time to drive the point home. I'm transmitting special mission coordinates. Get there ASAP.
You've made it clear Makeb is a Republic world. Now let's finish what we started here. My team has found a major target. Follow the coordinates I'm sending.
"Nice work" doesn't even cover it. They'll be teaching this op at the officer academy. I'm transmitting new mission orders and coordinates. Stay alert.
Good work! You've earned some downtime after this op. Head back to the station for a full debriefing.
